aphorisms.aphorism:
Everything faded into mist.
The past was erased, the erasure was forgotten, the lie became truth.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: Perhaps a man really dies when his brain stops, when he loses the power to take in a new idea.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: To see what is in front of one's nose needs a constant struggle.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: Fate seemed to be playing a series of extraordinarily unamusing jokes.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell
aphorisms.source: Down and Out in Paris and London

aphorisms.aphorism: Beauty is meaningless until it is shared.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: Nationalism is power-hunger tempered by self-deception.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism: The nationalist not only does not disapprove of atrocities committed by his own side, but he has a remarkable capacity for not even hearing about them.
aphorisms.author: George Orwell

aphorisms.aphorism:
中國的豆腐也是很好吃的東西，世界第一。
永別了！

aphorisms.aphorism: 死者倘不埋在活人的心中，那就真真死掉了。

aphorisms.aphorism: Kein Mensch bekämpft die Freiheit; er bekämpft höchstens die Freiheit der anderen.

aphorisms.aphorism: Der Mensch ist denselben Gesetzen unterworfen wie die Natur. Macht und Freiheit sind identisch.

aphorisms.aphorism: Die Arbeiter haben kein Vaterland.

aphorisms.aphorism: Die Geschichte aller bisherigen Gesellschaft ist die Geschichte von Klassenkämpfen.

aphorisms.aphorism: Die moderne Staatsgewalt ist nur ein Ausschuss, der die gemeinschaftlichen Geschäfte der ganzen Bourgeoisklasse verwaltet.

aphorisms.aphorism: In demselben Maße, in dem die Widerwärtigkeit der Arbeit wächst, nimmt daher der Lohn ab.

aphorisms.aphorism: Свобода в государстве, есть ложь.

aphorisms.aphorism: Что свобода без социализма — это привилегия, несправедливость, и что социализм без свободы — это рабство и животное состояние.
aphorisms.author: Михаил Александрович Бакунин

aphorisms.aphorism: Народ может и без нас обойтись, мы без него не можем.
aphorisms.author: Михаил Александрович Бакунин
